}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== According to [https://help.ubuntu.com/community/WifiDocs/Device/TP-Link_TL-WN620G_%28ndiswrapper%29 this], the USB ID is 0cf3:0002.
"62001" and "REV:1.0" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
Pictures here quite possible show 3 different versions of this device.
